attributes.action: request that all MPs standing down, over the expenses scandal, at the next general election resign immediately, so they don’t receive another huge hand out at the expense of the tax payer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When an MP looses their seat at an election they get an allowance to move house (their second home), the MPs quitting at the next election will get this, costing us tax payers more. If they resign  immediately they do not receive this allowance.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
